name: Jeremy's storage problem
description: A poem that needed superior editing to Rumpelstiltskin it from straw to spun gold: think Ezra Pound with TS Eliot's Wasteland, except replace TS Eliot with Marvin the Paranoid Android from Hitchhiker's Guide (sure you know the one). The original unedited version included at great cost (to me) but no cost for you, providing all the necessary contrast and white balance you desire. Comes in a fine multi-purpose and stain resistant pdf format. (Other digital formats available on request.) Great for starting out poets and a balm for under-appreciated frustrated editors everywhere. G'onnnn, you know you want to...
